HOME.title: Well now its your stuff
HOME.text-1: You know what I mean, just click the Stuff button
HOME.text-2: Or click the User button and add some users

STUFF.title: Here is all the Stuff
STUFF.text-1: Click the + button and start adding stuff. People will be GREEN with envy! .. or orange?

USER.title: Add some users
USER.text-1: Then they can play with your Stuff too. Click that -->
